title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 001
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The magazine items in this program looks at the wonders of food processing; a nature study item on the seal colony at Phillip Island; and Bowen Island as a fisherman’s paradise.
